original_text: But righteous men shall pass judgment on them with the sentence of adulteresses, and with the sentence of women who shed blood, because they are adulteresses, and blood is on their hands.”
korean_text: 의인이 간통한 여자들을 재판함 같이 재판하며 피를 흘린 여인을 재판함 같이 재판하리니 그들은 간통한 여자들이요 또 피가 그 손에 묻었음이라

sentences.original_text: But righteous men shall pass judgment on them
and with the sentence of women who shed blood
and blood is on their hands
